typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{SALE COUNTRY} as string,
		VEH_SOURCE as string,
		{IMPORT / DOMESTIC} as string,
		{Mnemonic Only} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE} as string,
		TCODE as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT} as string,
		{Regional Segment  Concat or DRI SEGMENT} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Platform} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Brand} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Nameplate or MODEL} as string,
		TRIM as string,
		Electric as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE} as string,
		DOORS as string,
		DRIVETYPE as string,
		{LAST UPDATE} as date,
		SERIES as string,
		TYPE_F as string,
		{SECTION WIDTH} as short,
		{ASPECT RATIO} as double,
		{TYPE CONSTRUCTION} as string,
		{RIM DIAMETER} as short,
		{LOAD INDEX} as string,
		{SPEED SYMBOL} as string,
		FRONT_SIZE as string,
		CORE_F_SIZE as string,
		{CHECK INFO F TO B} as string,
		TYPE_R as string,
		{REAR SECTION WIDTH} as short,
		{REAR ASPECT RATIO} as double,
		{REAR TYPE CONSTRUCTION} as string,
		{REAR RIM DIAMETER} as short,
		{REAR LOAD INDEX} as string,
		{REAR SPEED SYMBOL} as string,
		REAR_SIZE as string,
		CORE_R_SIZE as string,
		{TIRE PARENT} as string,
		TIRE_BRAND as string,
		TIRE_MODEL as string,
		{Tire Category} as short,
		{Vehicle App} as short,
		Segment as string,
		{Reporting Segment} as string,
		{Tire Designation} as string,
		{AS / SUM / WIN / LRR  APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING} as string,
		SIDEWALL as string,
		{WHEEL TYPE} as string,
		{RUN_FLAT DETAIL  (INTERNAL TO TIRE)} as string,
		PRES_MON as string,
		MON_SUPP as string,
		{SPARE DETAIL  (EXTERNAL TO TIRE)} as string,
		{1998_VVOL} as double,
		{1999_VVOL} as double,
		{2000_VVOL} as double,
		{2001_VVOL} as double,
		{2002_VVOL} as double,
		{2003_VVOL} as double,
		{2004_VVOL} as double,
		{2005_VVOL} as double,
		{2006_VVOL} as double,
		{2007_VVOL} as double,
		{2008_VVOL} as double,
		{2009_VVOL} as double,
		{2010_VVOL} as double,
		{2011_VVOL} as double,
		{2012_VVOL} as double,
		{2013_VVOL} as double,
		{2014_VVOL} as double,
		{2015_VVOL} as double,
		{2016_VVOL} as double,
		{2017_VVOL} as double,
		{2018_VVOL} as double,
		{2019_VVOL} as double,
		{2020_VVOL} as double,
		{2021_VVOL} as double,
		{2022_VVOL} as double,
		{2023_VVOL} as double,
		{2024_VVOL} as double,
		{2025_VVOL} as double,
		{1998_TVOL} as double,
		{1999_TVOL} as double,
		{2000_TVOL} as double,
		{2001_TVOL} as double,
		{2002_TVOL} as double,
		{2003_TVOL} as double,
		{2004_TVOL} as double,
		{2005_TVOL} as double,
		{2006_TVOL} as double,
		{2007_TVOL} as double,
		{2008_TVOL} as double,
		{2009_TVOL} as double,
		{2010_TVOL} as double,
		{2011_TVOL} as double,
		{2012_TVOL} as double,
		{2013_TVOL} as double,
		{2014_TVOL} as double,
		{2015_TVOL} as double,
		{2016_TVOL} as double,
		{2017_TVOL} as double,
		{2018_TVOL} as double,
		{2019_TVOL} as double,
		{2020_TVOL} as double,
		{2021_TVOL} as double,
		{2022_TVOL} as double,
		{2023_TVOL} as double,
		{2024_TVOL} as double,
		{2025_TVOL} as double,
		{Updated Segment} as string,
		{Updated Bodytype} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Price Class} as string,
		{Global Sales Segment} as string,
		{Global Sales Sub-segment} as string,
		{Global Sales Price Class} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales: Program} as string,
		{RUN_FLAT SIMPL} as string,
		{SPARE TIRE SIMPL} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OESrc1
source(output(
		OETireSize as string,
		LoadRange as string,
		Date_Updated as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
OESrc1 unpivot(output(
		Name as string,
		Value as double
	),
	ungroupBy({SALE COUNTRY},
		VEH_SOURCE,
		{IMPORT / DOMESTIC},
		{Mnemonic Only},
		{Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE},
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP},
		{Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT},
		{Regional Segment  Concat or DRI SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Sales: Platform},
		{Vehicle Sales: Brand},
		{Vehicle Sales: Nameplate or MODEL},
		TRIM,
		Electric,
		{Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE},
		DOORS,
		DRIVETYPE,
		{LAST UPDATE},
		SERIES,
		TYPE_F,
		{SECTION WIDTH},
		{ASPECT RATIO},
		{TYPE CONSTRUCTION},
		{RIM DIAMETER},
		{LOAD INDEX},
		{SPEED SYMBOL},
		FRONT_SIZE,
		CORE_F_SIZE,
		{CHECK INFO F TO B},
		TYPE_R,
		{REAR SECTION WIDTH},
		{REAR ASPECT RATIO},
		{REAR TYPE CONSTRUCTION},
		{REAR RIM DIAMETER},
		{REAR LOAD INDEX},
		{REAR SPEED SYMBOL},
		REAR_SIZE,
		CORE_R_SIZE,
		{TIRE PARENT},
		TIRE_BRAND,
		TIRE_MODEL,
		{Tire Category},
		{Vehicle App},
		Segment,
		{Reporting Segment},
		{Tire Designation},
		{AS / SUM / WIN / LRR  APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING},
		SIDEWALL,
		{WHEEL TYPE},
		{RUN_FLAT DETAIL  (INTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		PRES_MON,
		MON_SUPP,
		{SPARE DETAIL  (EXTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		{Updated Segment},
		{Updated Bodytype},
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Segment},
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Price Class},
		{Global Sales Segment},
		{Global Sales Sub-segment},
		{Global Sales Price Class},
		{Vehicle Sales: Program},
		{RUN_FLAT SIMPL},
		{SPARE TIRE SIMPL}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> OEUnpivot
OEUnpivot derive({Vehicle Model Year} = left(Name, 4),
		Value = iif(toString(toInteger(Value))=='x',0,toInteger(Value)),
		{Tire Volume} = iif(upper(substring(Name,6,4))=='TVOL',toInteger(Value),0),
		{Vehicle Sales Volume} = iif(upper(substring(Name,6,4))=='VVOL',toInteger(Value),0),
		{Volume Type} = upper(substring(Name,6,4)),
		{Tire Position} = 'Front and Rear',
		{Timestamp of Data} = toString(currentUTC()),
		{Timestamp Timezone} = 'EST',
		{Tire Load Range} = 'tbd',
		{Tire Size to lookup} = TYPE_F+CORE_F_SIZE+' '+{LOAD INDEX},
		{Volume Type} := upper(substring(Name, 5, 4))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy({SALE COUNTRY},
		VEH_SOURCE,
		{IMPORT / DOMESTIC},
		{Mnemonic Only},
		{Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE},
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP},
		{Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT},
		{Regional Segment  Concat or DRI SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Sales: Platform},
		{Vehicle Sales: Brand},
		{Vehicle Sales: Nameplate or MODEL},
		TRIM,
		Electric,
		{Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE},
		DOORS,
		DRIVETYPE,
		{LAST UPDATE},
		SERIES,
		TYPE_F,
		{SECTION WIDTH},
		{ASPECT RATIO},
		{TYPE CONSTRUCTION},
		{RIM DIAMETER},
		{LOAD INDEX},
		{SPEED SYMBOL},
		FRONT_SIZE,
		CORE_F_SIZE,
		{CHECK INFO F TO B},
		TYPE_R,
		{REAR SECTION WIDTH},
		{REAR ASPECT RATIO},
		{REAR TYPE CONSTRUCTION},
		{REAR RIM DIAMETER},
		{REAR LOAD INDEX},
		{REAR SPEED SYMBOL},
		REAR_SIZE,
		CORE_R_SIZE,
		{TIRE PARENT},
		TIRE_BRAND,
		TIRE_MODEL,
		{Tire Category},
		{Vehicle App},
		Segment,
		{Reporting Segment},
		{Tire Designation},
		{AS / SUM / WIN / LRR  APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING},
		SIDEWALL,
		{WHEEL TYPE},
		{RUN_FLAT DETAIL  (INTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		PRES_MON,
		MON_SUPP,
		{SPARE DETAIL  (EXTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		{Updated Segment},
		{Updated Bodytype},
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Segment},
		{Vehicle Sales: Regional Price Class},
		{Global Sales Segment},
		{Global Sales Sub-segment},
		{Global Sales Price Class},
		{Vehicle Sales: Program},
		{RUN_FLAT SIMPL},
		{SPARE TIRE SIMPL},
		{Vehicle Model Year},
		{Tire Position},
		{Timestamp of Data},
		{Timestamp Timezone},
		{Tire Load Range},
		{Tire Size to lookup}),
	{Tire Volume} = sum({Tire Volume}),
		{Vehicle Sales Volume} = sum({Vehicle Sales Volume})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, source1 lookup({Tire Size to lookup} == OETireSize,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		{Vehicle Sale Country} = {SALE COUNTRY},
		{Vehicle Source Country} = VEH_SOURCE,
		{Vehicle Source Classification} = {IMPORT / DOMESTIC},
		{Markit code} = {Mnemonic Only},
		MCODE = {Vehicle Sales: Mnemonic - Vehicle/Country or MCODE},
		TCODE,
		{Vehicle Sales Parent} = {Vehicle Sales: Sales Parent or GROUP},
		{Vehicle Macro Segment} = {Vehicle Sales: Car/Truck or MACRO LEVEL SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Sub-segment} = {Vehicle Sales: Regional Sub-Segment or MODIFIED SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Micro Segment} = {Regional Segment  Concat or DRI SEGMENT},
		{Vehicle Platform} = {Vehicle Sales: Platform},
		{Vehicle Brand} = {Vehicle Sales: Brand},
		{Vehicle Model} = {Vehicle Sales: Nameplate or MODEL},
		{Vehicle Trim} = TRIM,
		{Vehicle Electric Indicator} = Electric,
		{Vehicle Body Style} = {Vehicle Sales: Body Type or BODYSTYLE},
		{Vehicle Number of Doors} = DOORS,
		{Vehicle Drive Type} = DRIVETYPE,
		{Vehicle Last Update} = {LAST UPDATE},
		{Vehicle Series} = SERIES,
		{Tire Prefix} = TYPE_F,
		{Tire Section Width} = {SECTION WIDTH},
		{Tire Aspect Ratio} = {ASPECT RATIO},
		{Tire Construction} = {TYPE CONSTRUCTION},
		{Tire Rim Diameter} = {RIM DIAMETER},
		{Tire Load Index} = {LOAD INDEX},
		{Tire Speed Rating} = {SPEED SYMBOL},
		{Tire Total Size} = FRONT_SIZE,
		{Tire Size} = CORE_F_SIZE,
		{Front vs Rear Tire Different} = {CHECK INFO F TO B},
		{Tire Parent} = {TIRE PARENT},
		{Tire Brand} = TIRE_BRAND,
		{Tire Model} = TIRE_MODEL,
		{RMA Tire Category} = {Tire Category},
		{RMA Vehicle App} = {Vehicle App},
		{RMA Segment} = Segment,
		{Reporting Segment},
		{Tire Designation},
		{Tire Application} = {AS / SUM / WIN / LRR  APPLIES TO OEM MARKETING},
		{Tire Sidewall} = SIDEWALL,
		{Wheel Type} = {WHEEL TYPE},
		{Tire Run Flat Technology} = {RUN_FLAT DETAIL  (INTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		{Tire Pressure Monitoring} = PRES_MON,
		{Supplier of Tire Pressure Monitoring} = MON_SUPP,
		{Spare Detail} = {SPARE DETAIL  (EXTERNAL TO TIRE)},
		{Vehicle Updated Segment} = {Updated Segment},
		{Vehicle Updated Bodytype} = {Updated Bodytype},
		{Vehicle Regional Segment} = {Vehicle Sales: Regional Segment},
		{Vehicle Regional Price Class} = {Vehicle Sales: Regional Price Class},
		{Vehicle Global Segment} = {Global Sales Segment},
		{Vehicle Global Subsegment} = {Global Sales Sub-segment},
		{Vehicle Global Price Class} = {Global Sales Price Class},
		{Vehicle Program} = {Vehicle Sales: Program},
		{Simple Run Flat Detail} = {RUN_FLAT SIMPL},
		{Simple Spare Detail} = {SPARE TIRE SIMPL},
		{Vehicle Model Year},
		{Tire Volume},
		{Vehicle Sales Volume},
		{Tire Position},
		{Timestamp of Data},
		{Timestamp Timezone},
		{Tire Load Range}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		{Vehicle Sale Country} as string,
		{Vehicle Source Country} as string,
		{Vehicle Source Classification} as string,
		{Markit code} as string,
		MCODE as string,
		TCODE as string,
		{Vehicle Sales Parent} as string,
		{Vehicle Macro Segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Sub-segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Micro Segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Platform} as string,
		{Vehicle Brand} as string,
		{Vehicle Model} as string,
		{Vehicle Trim} as string,
		{Vehicle Electric Indicator} as string,
		{Vehicle Body Style} as string,
		{Vehicle Number of Doors} as string,
		{Vehicle Drive Type} as string,
		{Vehicle Last Update} as string,
		{Vehicle Series} as string,
		{Tire Prefix} as string,
		{Tire Section Width} as string,
		{Tire Aspect Ratio} as string,
		{Tire Construction} as string,
		{Tire Rim Diameter} as string,
		{Tire Load Index} as string,
		{Tire Speed Rating} as string,
		{Tire Total Size} as string,
		{Tire Size} as string,
		{Front vs Rear Tire Different} as string,
		{Tire Parent} as string,
		{Tire Brand} as string,
		{Tire Model} as string,
		{RMA Tire Category} as string,
		{RMA Vehicle App} as string,
		{RMA Segment} as string,
		{Reporting Segment} as string,
		{Tire Designation} as string,
		{Tire Application} as string,
		{Tire Sidewall} as string,
		{Wheel Type} as string,
		{Tire Run Flat Technology} as string,
		{Tire Pressure Monitoring} as string,
		{Supplier of Tire Pressure Monitoring} as string,
		{Spare Detail} as string,
		{Vehicle Updated Segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Updated Bodytype} as string,
		{Vehicle Regional Segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Regional Price Class} as string,
		{Vehicle Global Segment} as string,
		{Vehicle Global Subsegment} as string,
		{Vehicle Global Price Class} as string,
		{Vehicle Program} as string,
		{Simple Run Flat Detail} as string,
		{Simple Spare Detail} as string,
		{Vehicle Model Year} as string,
		{Tire Volume} as string,
		{Vehicle Sales Volume} as string,
		{Tire Position} as string,
		{Timestamp of Data} as string,
		{Timestamp Timezone} as string,
		{Tire Load Range} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OE_FAORECAST_OUTPUT1.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
